## **This website.**

如果在通过Github仓库阅读，点这里切换到[中文](https://github.com/qutang/qutang.dev/blob/master/README.cn.md)。

The website hosts my projects, posts and contact information. It is built using [sveltekit](https://kit.svelte.dev) + [svelte](https://svelte.dev) + [netlify](https://netlify.com) stack.

This website supports,

1. Internalization in Chinese.
2. Netlify CMS.
3. Pagination.
4. Mailchimp subscription.
5. Post categorization.
6. Sitemap + RSS.
7. Local markdown and jupyter notebook files.
8. Remote YuQue posts and github-hosted jupyter notebook files.

**Disclaimer: The website is developed in harsh (literally THREE days), codes are not well organized. Use it with caution.**

### Collaboration

1. Feel free to fork the repo and create your own website.
2. Be aware that the contents are shared and protected by [Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/) license.
3. If you want to co-author on the website, drop me a note via [contact information](https://qutang.dev/about#contact) on the website.
4. If you want to join to improve the website, create issues or send me pull requests.

### Future direction

So far I'm happy with the SSN (sveltekit + svelte + netlify) stack, so I will stay with them for quite a while. My primary work is done in Python, so forgive me about my bad JS coding skills.

A little story to share, my tech trajectory in terms of building personal website,

[![](https://mermaid.ink/img/eyJjb2RlIjoiZ3JhcGggTFJcbiAgd2RbV29yZHByZXNzIGluIFBocF1cbiAgamtbSmVreWxsIGluIFJ1YnldXG4gIGh4W0hleG8gaW4gSlNdXG4gIGdiW0dhdHNieSBpbiBSZWFjdF1cbiAgY2dbQ2hhcmdlIGluIFJlYWN0XVxuICBzcFtTYXBwZXIgaW4gU3ZlbHRlXSBcbiAgd2QgLS0-)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/#/edit/eyJjb2RlIjoiZ3JhcGggTFJcbiAgd2RbV29yZHByZXNzIGluIFBocF1cbiAgamtbSmVreWxsIGluIFJ1YnldXG4gIGh4W0hleG8gaW4gSlNdXG4gIGdiW0dhdHNieSBpbiBSZWFjdF1cbiAgY2dbQ2hhcmdlIGluIFJlYWN0XVxuICBzcFtTYXBwZXIgaW4gU3ZlbHRlXSBcbiAgd2QgLS0-)

I think Svelte makes the most sense, thanks to Rich Harris.
